author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Znap - Racer Review
review:
This is a very cool set to have and it's fun to play with as well. The build is very nice and easy and we get lot's of different models you can make with the pieces of this set as well. We also don't have to worry about stickers. This vehicle may doesn't have any play features but you're able to maneuver it very easily, too. As I told you in the beginning: It's a good little set to have - even for pieces which you can use for MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure.

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
